amendment.description: An amendment No. 83 printed in House Report 114-112 to require a report ranking all military departments and Defense Agencies in order of how advanced they are in achieving auditable financial statements as required by law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 83 printed in House Report 114-112 to require a report ranking all military departments and Defense Agencies in order of how advanced they are in achieving auditable financial statements as required by law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Burgess.
